item.title: Humble Bundle #3
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
ManlyStump:

Lucky! Everyone who bought bundle 3 before they added bundle 2 got it anyway, regardless of amount.

There are some real cheap ass bastards on these forums though!

I had $0.02 left in my paypal after buying Terraria and Solar 2. I didn’t know of anything that I could buy with $0.02; then this popped up out of an abyss that must have been crafted by God.

Seriously, one hour after I made those two purchases, this thread was made. I almost shat myself at the epic timing. :jizz:

Read full topic

item.title: Humble Bundle #3
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
I dunno, call me whatever you want, but I ended up getting it anyways. The newest additions made it seem worthwhile, and playing Mindcraft, essentially for free, seemed too much to pass up on.

Apparently, you can get the games from HB2 now. I’m still not going to play Braid.

Read full topic

item.title: Humble Bundle #3
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
striker:

I gave a dollar, dollar
a dollar is all I gave…

srsly: don’t whine about practical free games

This is the first bundle I’ve heard about, when do they actually emerge? Yearly?

I won’t buy them (even for a penny!) if I don’t find the games of any value to my tastes. Say what you will about my tastes, but the first Bundle is and was far more superior than anything they’ve presented since.

Penumbra: Chapter I ~ Awesome
World of Goo ~ Awesome (the reason I got the Bundle in the first place)
Gish ~ Awesome
Aquaria ~ Awesome
Samorost 2 ~ Intriguing, but good
Lugaru ~ Meh

Now it has already been said that you really can’t beat the first Bundle, because it was indeed an excellent collection of games with a neat bonus.

With that said, at this point I’d rather put money into Minecraft, and I’ll call a pass on this Bundle to wait for the next.

It’s just too bad that the current Bundle doesn’t come with an actual Minecraft subscription. Then I’d buy into that.

Read full topic

item.description:
pfannkuchen_gesicht:

VVVVVVV is annoying, I guess I have not enough patience.
I’m stuck at that place where you have to jump down the hole and avoid obstacles while falling and you need to jump up the hole to get to the other side.(pretty much at the beginning of the game)

OOOh. Sorrow. you need muscle memory for that one. Give it about 10 minutes and you will be long past it.
